resources.string: Ŋlɔ URL la ɖe wò settings.txt
Dzra Ðoɖowo Ðo Ðe Ðoɖo Nu
Tsɔ nyatakakawo katã ɖa eye nàtsi wo nu
Tiatiawɔblɔɖe: URL si wowɔ ɖe ɖoɖo nu
Widget ƒe ŋgɔgbekpa ƒe amadede tiatia
Widget ƒe megbenyawo ƒe amadede tiatia
Ðe nuxexlẽ siwo le xɔ me fiaa?
Ðeko wowɔ asitɔtrɔ le WiFi ŋua?
Nyagblɔɖi ƒe URL womeɖo o, trɔ asi le settings.txt ŋu be nàtrɔ
Wotrɔ asi le dɔwɔnu sia ŋu gake server si nèle kadodo me kplii la mewɔ inigo plugin la yeyee na Weewx o. Ðewohĩ agblewo madze nyuie o vaseɖe esime wowɔ Weewx yeyee
Taflatse lala esime míele URL si nèɖo ɖa la dzi ɖom
Èka ɖe edzi be yedi be yeaɖe nyatakakawo katã ɖaa?
Icons do kpo eƒe kɔpi wɔwɔ bliboe, ahiã be nàgadze agbagba ake
Mete ŋu de dzesi nyagblɔɖi ƒe nɔnɔmetatawo o
Maɖɔe ɖo eye magadze agbagba ake
Vodada aɖe dzɔ esime wonɔ agbagba dzem be yewoatrɔ asi le wo zazã ŋu
Vodada si womenya o la dzɔ
wasn\'t able to connect alo download tso custom URL si woɖo la me
Mete ŋu do ka alo wɔ webcam nɔnɔmetata aɖe tso wò server dzi o
Mete ŋu do ka alo wɔ nyagblɔɖia ƒe kɔpi o
Mete ŋu de dzesi nyagblɔɖi ƒe nɔnɔmetatawo o
Nyagblɔɖi ƒomevi \'%%1$ss\' hiã be nɔnɔmetatawo nanɔ anyi, taflatse trɔ ɖe dzesiwo zazã ŋu eye nàgadze agbagba ake
Nyagblɔɖi ƒe ƒomevi \'%%1$ss\' mele eteƒe o, lé ŋku ɖe wò settings file ŋu eye nàgadze agbagba ake
Mete ŋu do ka alo wɔ radar= nɔnɔmetata tso internet dzi o
Mete ŋu do ka alo wɔ data.txt tso wò server dzi o
Mete ŋu do ka alo wɔ ɖoɖoawo tso wò server dzi o
Woɖo URL ɖe default la dzi alo nɔ ƒuƒlu
Radar URL meɖoe o alo egakpɔtɔ le eƒe kɔpi wɔm. Àte ŋu ayi Settings be nàtrɔ
Mete ŋu do ka alo wɔ nyagblɔɖia ƒe kɔpi o
